title: Cluster Registration
description: Defines the registration details of an OV cluster within a namespace.

id.description: DID of the cluster registration document.

namespace.description: DID of the namespace this cluster belongs to.

supportedPlugins.description: List of plugin DIDs this cluster supports.

nodeOperators.description: List of DIDs of node operators in this cluster.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the cluster was registered.

proof.description: Cryptographic proof of the cluster registration.

verificationMethod.description: DID or method used to verify this proof.
